Title: Sully
Writer: Todd Komarnicki, Chesley Sullenberger (based on the book "Highest Duty" by), Jeffrey Zaslow (based on the book "Highest Duty" by)
Actors: Tom Hanks, Aaron Eckhart, Valerie Mahaffey, Delphi Harrington
Plot: On Thursday, January 15th, 2009, the world witnessed the "Miracle on the Hudson" when Captain Chesley Sullenberger, nicknamed "Sully", glided his disabled plane onto the frigid waters of the Hudson River, saving the lives of all 155 aboard. However, even as Sully was being heralded by the public and the media for his unprecedented feat of aviation skill, an investigation was unfolding that threatened to destroy his reputation and his career.
Awards: Nominated for 1 Oscar. Another 14 wins & 34 nominations.
Production: IMAX Corporation, Malpaso Company, Village Roadshow Pictures, Warner Bros. Pictures
